mapper.select: select count(*) from board where board_status = 1

select * from (select rownum as rnum, b.*from (select board_no, board_title, board_img, board_writer, to_char(board_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as board_date from board where board_status=1 order by board_no Desc)b) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
